name: NanoMaze
description:
Objective 

You are a nanobot and you must escape 3 areas of a robots brain as it shuts down due to a virus which has taken over, escape the maze of the robots brain and get to the end.

Controls  

W A S D to move, space to jump, Esc to exit to Main Menu.

Built for LudumDare42. 

Current Build is 1.2 for both 64 bit and 32Bit Windows Systems
